articles.author: Andrew McMurtry
articles.title: Legendary coach says Warner is no ‘great’
articles.description: David Warner left the Test cricket stage to a hero’s reception in the third Test against Pakistan but former Australian cricket coach John Buchanan has questioned his place as a “great” in the game.
articles.content: David Warner left the Test cricket stage to a hero’s reception in the third Test against Pakistan but former Australian cricket coach John Buchanan has questioned his place as a “great” in the game.… [+3440 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
